Name: Knights of Favonius Library
Title: Athenaeum of the North
Desc: "Most of the books here can be lent out, but do bear in mind that you will have to return them... on time."

Talent.Name: Knights of Favonius Library
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Select any Elemental Dice to reroll.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> Gain another chance to reroll.
